competitors.name: Juniper Networks
competitors.notes: Biggest rival to Cisco, competed in almost every technology area

competitors.name: Aruba Networks
competitors.notes: Acquired by HPE in 2015, offered switches and routers with innovative processes

competitors.name: Arista Networks
competitors.notes: Run by ex-Cisco exec Jayshree Ullal, focused on cloud-based networking and data centers

competitors.name: Huawei
competitors.notes: Huge competitor of Cisco's largely outside of the United States

competitors.name: Dell/EMC
competitors.notes: Dell acquired EMC in 2015, merged into 150,000+ employee company

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks
competitors.notes: Became one of biggest cybersecurity players with App-ID technology

competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: Technology competitor in various IT segments

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Technology competitor in various IT segments

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Technology competitor in cloud and IT segments

context: 2015 marked significant consolidation with HPE acquiring Aruba Networks and Dell acquiring EMC. Cloud giants like Google, Microsoft, and Amazon were emerging as competitors.
